sentences.sContent: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.sCn: 这种新式火箭由军方进行了广泛的测试和调试。

sentences.sContent: Dr Alloway, from the University of Stirling in Scotland, has extensively studied working memory and believes it to be far more important to success and happiness than IQ.
sentences.sCn: 来自苏格兰的斯特灵大学阿洛韦博士，已经广泛的研究“工作记忆”，并认为它是比智商更为重要对于成功和幸福来说。

words.tran: 延伸的；扩大的；长期的；广大的
延长；延期；扩大；伸展；电话分机
延伸；扩大；推广；伸出；给予；使竭尽全力；对…估价
